short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension that allows you to send WhatsApp messages in bulk
short.pt_BR: Extens√£o do Chrome que permite enviar mensagens do WhatsApp em massa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Automated Messaging and File Sending Extension for WhatsApp" is an essential tool for marketers, sales teams, business owners, and anyone looking to automate and optimize their interactions on WhatsApp. With advanced features and an intuitive interface, it provides a convenient solution for streamlining the sending of messages and files, saving time and improving efficiency.
